channel.title: Synestia Development Team
channel.description:
[size=6][b]IF YOU ARE FROM THE TUTORIAL SECTION, PLEASE LEAVE.[/b][/size] Hello. Originally, this was a server owned by a friend of mine and me, but he doesn't have internet atm, and he is telling me to wait and that he will get. Over a year has passed, and he still doesn't have an internet connection anywhere but at his friends. That is why i'm opening a development team thread for Synestia! I have already bought the domain, setup a professional vBulletin forums with sections, ranks and mods(shoutbox, staff apps etc). I am going to be providing the VPS(4GB RAM, look below for picture), GFX and my friend will be head admin. However, we need a coder(java is a must, but i have a friend that is TRUSTED that can program PHP for me free if needed). [img]http://synestia.no/legacy/vps.png[/img] The coder can choose what revision we are going to use(must be a stable base), and he MUST be a professional coder that is able to create his own code. Examples: Minigames Skills Dupe/Bug Fixes etc. You get the picture. We will be sharing the donations 50/50. As the server grows, we will have to buy a dedicated server. First we will buy the dedi, then split 2/4 of the money left from donations that month(2/4 left if needed). If you are interested, please post below with the following format:
Some of your work: What programming languages do you know?: What are you able to code?: Why do you want to be in the development team?: MSN:
Note: [b]I HAVE PHYSICAL ACCESS TO THE SERVER, IF YOU ARE A SCAMMER, LEAVE.[/b]

item.description:

Ix Soulcist xI:

At least provide some decent information about what else is going to be on the development, and I would imagine an application format for people to fill out so you can tell what their better in.

Made a little form.

item.title: Synestia Development Team
item.dc:creator: @minikiller minikiller
item.description:
@minikiller wrote:

Roxee™:

If you posted this, leave. ^^ oh hey buddy I think you didnt read what I said, you have to leave.

Well you are certainly a derp. I’m not from the tutorial section, that’s why im requesting a coder. Tutorial kids make crappy servers via tutorials. If i were from the tutorial section, don’t u think that i would have made one of those shit servers aswell?

IF YOU AREN’T INTERESTED, DON’T POST!

Read full topic

item.title: Synestia Development Team
item.dc:creator: @minikiller minikiller
item.description:
@minikiller wrote:

[size=6]IF YOU ARE FROM THE TUTORIAL SECTION, PLEASE LEAVE.[/size]

Hello.

Originally, this was a server owned by a friend of mine and me, but he doesn’t have internet atm, and he is telling me to wait and that he will get. Over a year has passed, and he still doesn’t have an internet connection anywhere but at his friends. That is why i’m opening a development team thread for Synestia!

I have already bought the domain, setup a professional vBulletin forums with sections, ranks and mods(shoutbox, staff apps etc).

I am going to be providing the VPS(4GB RAM, look below for picture), GFX and my friend will be head admin. However, we need a coder(java is a must, but i have a friend that is TRUSTED that can program PHP for me free if needed).

The coder can choose what revision we are going to use(must be a stable base), and he MUST be a professional coder that is able to create his own code. Examples:

Minigames
Skills
Dupe/Bug Fixes

etc. You get the picture.

We will be sharing the donations 50/50. As the server grows, we will have to buy a dedicated server. First we will buy the dedi, then split 2/4 of the money left from donations that month(2/4 left if needed).

If you are interested, please post below with the following format:

Some of your work: What programming languages do you know?: What are you able to code?: Why do you want to be in the development team?: MSN:

Note: I HAVE PHYSICAL ACCESS TO THE SERVER, IF YOU ARE A SCAMMER, LEAVE.

Read full topic
